Message.Title: All the waiting praise was cast aside and for naught
Message.Msg: Imagine if that character Ronmey was elected? the Hawfeeces team would be heaping credit on Ronmey day and night, all the while blaming Obama. Ronmey would be glowing and gleaming in republican credit for dow 14000. Feeces woulld proclaim GM was saved by Ronmey himself, dressed in a golden cape, leaping from roof to roof saving the nation. All the spending would be approved, blank checks written everywhere, taxes for the rich set to zero, relations with China would be near war stage, and at least one new war to profit from would be starting. All wasted, now they have nothing left but bitterness and have to scramble their minds thinking of how to believe good news is really bad.

Topic.Title: All the waiting praise was cast aside and for naught

Message.Msg: Do you have a cot in the corner here? Your team is not imaginary. Of course GM has not been saved to you, now, under good President Obama. If you read, it is under Ronmey that you will heap credit on. Praising Ronmey for saving and restoring GM, with the same Obama ideas. Ronmey is as good as on the assembly line himself punching out the new cars alone. Romney himself took credit for GM when Obama's plan worked, and after the fact. Till then it was Obama bashing day and night. Obama's success shut most up, except old holdouts like you. Your second paragrapgh proves my post correct, thank you. I don't think you have any honesty in you at all. I am going to get things done now, sorry you are super glued to your chair and can't move. Send your wife out for some glue remover.

Topic.Title: Hawcraper just can't accept reality, so he lies even to himself

Message.Msg: NO, I listened to the congressional hearings on banking, and every liberal Democrat blasted the banks for not providing mortgage loans to flakes in high risk loan areas. The libs called it "red lining" and made the compassionate appeal to the voters that the rich guy banks were preventing poor folks from owning a home as if it was an entitlement. Barney Franks pushed, and helped put teeth into the Community Reorganization ACT as well as Slick Willy, and the rest is history. Banks were forced to make loans, and Barney promised that Fanny and Freddie would buy up the risky loans, and remove the risk from the banks. "You just write the loans, and we will buy them up." Along with low loan rates this created the speculative buying frenzy as well as the subprime loans. In the end, Alan Greenspan, Mr. economy guru, said that he miscalculated the impact on the overall economy from the subprime loans. He stated he thought it would have a minumum effect when it had a major effect. But then Barney and friends highly leveraging these loans selling "bundled" loan packages called (??) to foreign Central banks, and the entire packages went under because of the bad home loans brought down world economies. Totally a lbieral playground of squandering tax payer money...Barney, Freddie, and Fanny.

Economy is contracting. Official govenment statistics say inflation is flat, except for the cots of food & fuel! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! But we are to believe that that everything is wonderful in Obamaland, and what isn't is all Bush's fault!
